localize.text: Rhinoceros on the move! I'm confident in our abilities!
Let's hit hard and block hard!
Never mind the facilities, it's our job to go on a rampage!
It's an honor to be able to compete with the Red Mist!
Hey, Manager! Fighting with an Arbiter is a breach of contract!
Half the rhino have been trampled.
How many are left, half of em'?
Half of us are dead! Charge ahead, and the path will open up!
Half of the rhino have been trampled, but the struggle isn't over!
Even if it's not a real Arbiter, it's still a bitch to deal with!
80% trampled. Looks like we've got ourselves quite the opponent.
80% of the rhinos are dead. C'mon, It's up to you if you live or die here!
We're out 80%. You're as tough as the bunny always says!
I can't believe it's this tough, even degraded... Yeesh, a real one would be a pain.
Rhinoceros annihilated! Whoops, we got trampled.
All the rhinos are dead, and we didn't even get to go all out...
The Rhinos were wiped out! That's a pain in the ass.
Man, we got shoved aside like nothing...
We've met our match. We'll be rooting for ya!
Go alone like the rhino’s horn!
That was easier than dealing with the stuff in the Ruins!
Weren’t so tough after all!
Mission accomplished! The rhinos will forget all about what happened here!
Haha! Are we really that strong?
Even if you're an Arbiter, your skills don't mean shit against overwhelming power!
Rhino
Don't hesitate, be bold!
Any enemy will be crushed by the rhino's feet!
Nothing stands in the way of a rhino!
Captain. Can I just jump right in?
Poor bastards!
Deal with the straglers!
Off you go!
You're in my way... how foolish of you, haha!
You too are forsaken!
What a waste of a weapon.
Clear!
You're carrying some useful gear.
Not a risk.
Which one should I trample first?
You're very fragile, aren't you?
Maybe a risk.
Such attacks don't work!
Huh, this thing from the ruins?
Taking a bit of a walk, huh! Back to your cell!
I'll take it out in one hit!
Big risk.
Now this, this could be fun!
Eh? Are they using these things to make energy somehow?
If they used this during the Smoke Wars, we'd be in trouble.
I don't care if these monsters get in my way! I have a job to do!
Real big risk.
Let's hope it doesn't lead to the annihilation of the pack!
Against monsters, we shouldn't be this weak...!
I'll be dead if I screw up around this one.
It's like walking into the heart of the ruins...
Maximum mental corruption reached. Commencing automatic disposal.
Automatic disposal to eliminate all human risk.
Mission accomplished!
We win!
It's been a while since we've had a decent opponent!
You thought you could win? Too bad!
